oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Memphis Blues
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Handy, W. C.; music; sheet music; Crump, E. H.; Beale Street;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of the sheet music to W. C. Handy's "The Memphis Blues," as played by Handy and his band. Originally named "Mister Crump," this composition was used as an election song for E. H. Crump. This specific composition was published by the original publisher, Theron C. Bennett Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Handy, W. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: W. C. Handy Beale Street Collection
